Pre-Game Insights: Croatia needs a win to continue their campaign at Euro 2024.
Coach Zlatko Dalic is expected to rotate his resources in search of a quick change in fortunes.
Midfielder Marcelo Brozovic may be dropped to the bench, allowing Luka Sucic or Martin Baturina to start.
Luka Modric and Mateo Kovacic will likely start alongside each other in midfield.
Ante Budimir could replace Bruno Petkovic in the starting XI.
Josko Gvardiol is set to continue in his preferred role as a central defender.
